items.title: Suspect in DC shooting of 2 National Guard members formally charged with murder
items.description: The suspect, Rahmanullah Lakanwal, appeared in court remotely from a hospital.

items.title: Trump admin updates: Hegseth says he did not see 2nd boat strike, survivors
items.description: Hegseth said he saw the first attack, but didn't "stick around" for the second.

items.title: Crystal egg crafted for Russian royalty shatters record and sells for $30.2 million
items.description: A rare Fabergé egg crafted for Russia’s ruling family before the revolution has sold for more $30 million
